thread.title: Wayne Rooney ready to quit Manchester United in £52million move to China that will make him the highest-paid player in the world
thread.title_full: Wayne Rooney ready to quit Manchester United in £52million move to China that will make him the highest-paid player in the world

author: rforrester
title: Wayne Rooney ready to quit Manchester United in £52million move to China that will make him the highest-paid player in the world
text:
EFL End of an era Wayne Rooney ready to quit Manchester United in £52million move to China that will make him the highest-paid player in the world 
England striker will earn £1million a week in the Far East and is set to complete his move before their transfer window closes next week By Neil Custis
